__e: Attendez, regardez et apprenez.
Wait, watch and learn.
Maintenant regardez... et apprenez.
Now watch. And learn.
Regardez et apprenez, les enfants.
Watch and learn, kids.
Regardez et apprenez de moi au début.
Watch and learn from me at first.
Regardez et apprenez de lui, tout le monde !
Look and learn from this, everyone!
Alors observez et apprenez de nos experts ou vous serez éliminé.
So watch and learn from our experts or you will be eliminated.

- Watch and learn, rosen, watch and learn.

- Watch and learn, rosen, watch and learn.

You two, watch and learn.

Those not fighting, watch and learn.

And I told them. "Learn. Listen and learn."

Don't let mistakes demoralise you. Put them down to experience and learn from them.
Prévenez-moi si vous apprenez quelque chose.
Well, let me know if you do hear anything.
Prévenez-moi si vous apprenez quelque chose de nouveau.
Let me know if you find something new.
Prévenez-moi si vous apprenez quoi que ce soit.
Let me know if anything turns up.
S'il vous plait, appelez-moi si vous apprenez quelque chose ou si vous voyez quelque chose de suspect autour de son appartement.
Please call me if you hear anything or if you see anything suspicious going around his apartment.
Appelez-moi si vous apprenez quelque chose sur les complices.
Call me if you hear something about the accomplices.
Appelez-moi si vous apprenez quelque chose.

Anyway, if you hear anything, please be sure to tell me, okay?
Mais je pense aussi que si vous apprenez à me connaître, vous pourrez vous faire votre propre idée de qui je suis vraiment.
But I also think that, if you get to know me better, that you can decide for yourself the person that I really am.
Je ne peux pas parler de ton passé mais je pense que vous pourriez avoir un moment plus facile, et peut-être un peu plus amusant, si vous apprenez simplement à faire confiance aux gens.
I can't speak to your past, but I think you might have an easier time of it, and maybe a little bit more fun, if you just learn to trust people.
Tout ce que vous apprenez vous sera utile un jour.
Whatever you learn is bound to come in handy one day.

All you ever learn is how to shut everybody up,

Everything you learn eventually comes in handy, as long as it's not stealing.
